summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless about downgrading their TV service. The agent was able to provide information on several different packages that were available, including the mid-tier package which offers access to over 75 popular channels at a discounted rate of $39.99 per month compared to the customer's current rate of $59.99 per month. The customer decided to switch to the mid-tier package and the agent provided all the information needed for the customer to make the switch.
